body.text:
Open Git Bash 

 Use below link to install if not installed

Clone Repository: 

 git clone git@github3.cisco.com:<cec_id>/ctap.git 

 Ex: git clone git@github3.cisco.com:<cec_id>/ctap.git

Install node modules: 

 cd ctap 

 ./utils/appserver setup 

 ./utils/appserver start 

 cd /tests 

 npm install

Install sqlite3 module in tests,cue and cma folders 

 npm sqlite3 

 cd ../cma 

 npm sqlite3 

 cd ../cue 

 npm sqlite3

Run Robohydra: 

 cd ../tests 

 node node_modules/robohydra/bin/robohydra -I ./robohydra-plugin/ -n -P ib_vws_mock -p 4730 

 Open robohydra using Activate Robohydra option 

 Activate ib_vws_mock plugin

Local Changes In kIB.json: 

 Set consoleOnly flag to true to enable log 

 Change DB path of dbBasePath, plannerDBPath, serviceDbBasePath

Local Changes In default.json: 

 Change server port other then 8000 in window machine.

Start DCTAP server: 

 cd ../cue 

 NODE_ENV=kIB NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./etc node --inspect server.js
